title: Feature request: nn.View
body_html:
Is there any ability to add layer View identical to Tensor.view in order to do something like this

self.conv = nn.Sequential(
    nn.Conv2d(1, 3, kernel_size=5, stride=2, padding=2),
    ...
    Various Conv Layers
    ...
    
    nn.View(-1, conv_out_size)
    nn.Linear(conv_out_size, out_size)        
)

body:
Is there any ability to add layer `View` identical to Tensor.view in order to do something like this

```
self.conv = nn.Sequential(
    nn.Conv2d(1, 3, kernel_size=5, stride=2, padding=2),
    ...
    Various Conv Layers
    ...
    
    nn.View(-1, conv_out_size)
    nn.Linear(conv_out_size, out_size)        
)
```
